tool_description: Manages location configurations, capacity limits, and movement rules for inventory tracking across different storage locations.

location_type.description: Type of location: warehouse, store, supplier, customer, transit

max_capacity.description: Maximum number of units this location can hold

allowed_item_types.description: Array of item types allowed at this location

restricted_movements.description: Array of movement types not allowed from/to this location

active.description: Whether this location is currently active

error_messages: Invalid location type: Must be one of [warehouse, store, supplier, customer, transit]
Duplicate location ID: Location with this ID already exists
Invalid capacity: Max capacity must be a positive integer
Location in use: Cannot deactivate location with current inventory
Invalid item type: One or more item types in allowed list do not exist
usage: Provide location_id as minimum requirement. Optionally configure location_name, location_type, max_capacity, allowed_item_types, restricted_movements, and active status.

location_id.description: The location identifier that was configured

configuration_status.description: Status of the location configuration operation

current_utilization.description: Current capacity utilization as a percentage
